timeline.message: Feat(JPA): Create distribution job entity java model
Feat(JPA): Create BlackDuck distribution job entity java models
Feat(JPA): Create Azure Boards distribution job entity java models
Feat(JPA): Create Email distribution job entity java models
Fix(JPA): Add missing add_comments column to Azure Boards
Feat(JPA): Create Jira Cloud distribution job entity java models
Feat(JPA): Create Jira Server distribution job entity java models
Feat(JPA): Create MS Teams distribution job entity java models
Feat(JPA): Create Slack distribution job entity java models and complete join columns in core distribution entity
Fix(Liquibase): Make nested job channel tables reference the channel details job_id as primary key

timeline.bodyText: Should we have this be blackduck instead of blackDuck? There are more instances if we need to change this.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: I think for capitalized usages and camelCase, we want it to be BlackDuck and blackDuck respectively. With snake case, all characters should be lowercase, but it should still be one word.
replies.author: gkillough
